infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Used to connect you to your music while riding, without having to leave the app.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Used to update your profile picture and provide pictures of your activities.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Used to connect you with your friends and family or to allow you to invite them to join.
infoPlist.NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD: Used to help you keep track of your health benefits while riding.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Used for mapping bike routes, current location features, and search nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Used for mapping bike routes, current location features, and search nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Used for mapping bike routes, current location features, and search nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Used for mapping bike routes, current location features, and search nearby places.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used to command siri to run features like starting a ride.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Used to give you real time data about your ride and for visualization data for after.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to allow you access to your personal photos library, to share or view images taken while exploring.
